mapper.sql: award_id, user_number, award_dpt_cost, award_personal_cost, award_birth_redb, award__time, award_status, award_remark
mapper.insert: insert into award (award_id, user_number, award_dpt_cost, award_personal_cost, award_birth_redb, award__time, award_status, award_remark) values (#{awardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{awardDptCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{awardPersonalCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{awardBirthRedb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{awardTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{awardStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{awardRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

award_id,

mapper.update:
update award
user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
award_dpt_cost = #{awardDptCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
award_personal_cost = #{awardPersonalCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
award_birth_redb = #{awardBirthRedb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
award__time = #{awardTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
award_status = #{awardStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
award_remark = #{awardRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where award_id = #{awardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update award set user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, award_dpt_cost = #{awardDptCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, award_personal_cost = #{awardPersonalCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, award_birth_redb = #{awardBirthRedb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, award__time = #{awardTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, award_status = #{awardStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, award_remark = #{awardRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where award_id = #{awardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select w.award_id as awardId, w.user_number as userNumber, w.award_dpt_cost as awardDptCost, w.award_personal_cost as awardPersonalCost, w.award_birth_redb as awardBirthRedb, w. award__time as awardTime, w.award_status as awardStatus, w.award_remark as awardRemark,u.user_username as username,u.user_dpt as userdpt,u.user_dpt_jbn as userdptjob from award w ,user u where w.user_number=u.user_number and DATE_FORMAT( w. award__time , '%Y%m' )=DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) order by awardTime;

select w.award_id as awardId, w.user_number as userNumber, w.award_dpt_cost as awardDptCost, w.award_personal_cost as awardPersonalCost, w.award_birth_redb as awardBirthRedb, w. award__time as awardTime, w.award_status as awardStatus, w.award_remark as awardRemark,u.user_username as username,u.user_dpt as userdpt,u.user_dpt_jbn as userdptjob from award w ,user u where w.user_number=u.user_number and u.user_number = #{uid} order by awardTime desc;

select
from award where user_number = #{user_number,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DATE_FORMAT(award__time , '%Y%m' )=DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )
